commit message: Cleaning using SonarQube. Got rid of all 'Critical' code issues.

Fixed task 51: 'Stop following' doesn't work at pump.io sites
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/51
Fixed Ringtone settings regression
Tests for activities added
Fixed failed tests. Tested for Android APIs 8 - 19
More SonarQube issues fixed.

Combined timeline setting now persists between sessions.
'AndStatus' client name now appears as an attribute of StatusNet dents
(not 'api' as before).

OPEN - task 50: Show the whole conversation tree including later replies
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/50
Fixed crash during 'Share' action and not selected message
Custom Image showing level of indentation in a Conversation view

Fixed indent problem using DIP to Pixel conversion.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2238883/what-is-the-correct-way-to-specify-dimensions-in-dip-from-java-code

Fixed - task 52: Date parse error causes crash of the application
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/52

Fixes for Android v.2.x: Improved Conversation view (colored lines
added!), message text color fixed.

Fixed task 45: Modify Combined view of User timeline
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/45

Implementing task 39: Showing avatar pictures
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/39
Tests passed
Small fixes
Trying to optimize calls to Locale.getDefault()
Cleaned SonarQube-detected issues

Fixed task 21: Added accounts are lost when App is moved to SD Card
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/21

Moving avatars between storages, fixes for task 39: Showing avatar
pictures
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/39

Fixed regression with base64 encoding (after I got rid of custom Base64
class)
Cleaning
Nice view tweaks done, and two potential FCs fixed
